content: this a pattern for a sunflower drawstring bag using the sunburst granny square method gorgeous bag that can be used for going shopping days out or music festivals when we re allowed to again this lovely bag can be made to any size you desire my bag is 7 x 7 which can fit my phone keys small purse hand sanitiser and hand wipes it does start getting a little heavy if you start adding more so i tend to just keep my phone in my back pocket gauge is not important for this pattern you will need * 5mm hook * yarn aran or cotton aran * tapestry needle for weaving in your ends * scissors
